attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of inicent animals each year are tested on in laboritories for new drugs and cosmetics. Why not test products and drugs on some of the worst murderers and rapists in the prisons. They have done something wrong, so why should animals that haven't done anything wrong at all be treated in this way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
